latinStringWithHyphens.description: If a string is limited to characters of the Latin alphabet and hyphens, then this type is used.

latinStringWithDigitsAndPunctuation.description: If a string is limited to characters of the Latin alphabet, digits and punctuation, then this type is used.

fileOrDirectoryName.description: File and directory names consist of characters that work in popular file systems in Linux, Windows, and Mac OSX.

extensibleMarkupLanguageDocument.description: Extensible Markup Language (XML) document serialized as JSON string

sha256Hash.description: This type should be used for hashes according to SHA-256.
